item.description:
Szechuan Tokyo Restaurant features Szechuan Chinese Specialties and Japanese Delicacies from their Kitchen and Award-Winning Sushi Bar.

Szechuan Tokyo Restaurant is also famous for being the top presenter of live jazz music in an intimate supper-club setting, featuring a critically acclaimed lineup of talent for over 10 years. And so, we are going jazzy with Troy Brown...jazz with an R & B flavor.

TROY BROWN AND FRIENDS - Jazzy at once, then funky, then soulful -- TROY BROWN is an enchanting personality and talented song stylist who'll get you off your feet. Troy and his exquisitely talented musicians make every performance a party! Dinner at 7:00...let's meet at 6:45. Showtime's at 8:00.

The last time Troy was here, we had a blast...had everyone on their feet and dancing!!!
Come join us for terrific jazz and great company. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, Stuart or the Meetup Sign...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Goin' Jazzy...# 3 @ SZECHUAN TOKYO. Troy Brown Is back!
